Package me.scolastico.tools.cache

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.scolastico.tools.cache.CacheManager
  • public class CacheManager
extends Object
    CacheManager for simple storing and accessing of values in cache files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CacheManager()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void destroy()
      Destroy ALL items in the cache.

      Delete an item by its id.
      static void destroyOld()
      Destroy old cache items that expired.

      Get something out of the cache.

      Store something in the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Destroy ALL items in the cache.

      • destroy

        public static void destroy​(String id)
        Delete an item by its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the cache item.

      • destroyOld

        public static void destroyOld()
        Destroy old cache items that expired.

      • get

        public static <X> X get​(String id,
                        Class<X> classOf,
                        Callable<X> callable)
                 throws Exception
        Get something out of the cache. If it's not existing the callable will be called for new data which will then be stored in the cache. If something new is cached it will be stored for 3600 seconds.
        Type Parameters:
        X - The type of the value which should be cached.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the cache item. Should be something unique.
        classOf - The class of the value which should be cached.
        callable - The callable if the cache is empty to get a new value.
        Returns:
        The cached value.
        Throws:
        Exception - Passthroughs of the callable exceptions.

      • get

        public static <X> X get​(String id,
                        Class<X> classOf,
                        Callable<X> callable,
                        int validUntil)
                 throws Exception
        Get something out of the cache. If it's not existing the callable will be called for new data which will then be stored in the cache.
        Type Parameters:
        X - The type of the value which should be cached.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the cache item. Should be something unique.
        classOf - The class of the value which should be cached.
        callable - The callable if the cache is empty to get a new value.
        validUntil - How long the cache should be valid. In seconds.
        Returns:
        The cached value.
        Throws:
        Exception - Passthroughs of the callable exceptions.

      • store

        public static <X> void store​(String id,
                             X value)
        Store something in the cache. This function will cache for 3600 seconds (one hour).
        Type Parameters:
        X - The type of the value which should be cached.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the cache item. Should be something unique.
        value - The value to store in the cache.

      • store

        public static <X> void store​(String id,
                             X value,
                             int validUntil)
        Store something in the cache.
        Type Parameters:
        X - The type of the value which should be cached.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the cache item. Should be something unique.
        value - The value to store in the cache.
        validUntil - How long the cache should be valid. In seconds.
